comments:

Please provide steps to reproduce this.  I have not seen this before, and I 
think I have shutdown my runtime workbench on occasion ;-)

See GraphicalViewerImpl.handleDispose().
It disposes the update manager, which means that performupdate will return 
without executing.  You must have some other nested error which caused this 
secondary exception.
